Body.Content:
We are announcing the ability to use prompts in Copilot agents to extract and augment information from documents in AI Builder. This feature will reach general availability on September 15, 2025.

How does this affect me?
With this feature, you can extract and augment information from documents in AI Builder.

Supported image and document types:
  • .PNG
  • .JPG
  • JPEG
  • .PDF
What action do I need to take?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

If you would like more information on this feature, please visit Process documents with Copilot prompts.

Title: AI Builder â€“ Process documents with Copilot prompts
